rows.label: tlk45200111_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't like the war. It
doesn't make any sense.

rows.label: tlk45200111_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It just makes everybody be
horrible to everybody else...

rows.label: tlk45200111_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Grandma says there's nothing
better than a world at peace!

rows.label: tlk45200111_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I wish grown-ups would
just stop fighting...
